thread.section_title: Halpennygolf Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Halpennygolf | halpennygolf.com
thread.title: D Curtin

author: D Curtin
title: D Curtin
text: I bought a pair of golf shoes online. When they arrived I got two right foot shoes. I contacted Halpenny to be told that unfortunately this was the last pair in stock and no more were due. Eugene in Halpenny, sensing my disappointment, asked if he could have a day or two to check out the stocks with the supplier. Three days later he called to say he located a new pair of shoes. The box contained a left and right shoe. I really appreciate their friendly and caring service.
